sub_fields.message: Content for this section will come from the Sitewide.

sub_fields.label: Items
sub_fields.name: items
sub_fields.instructions:
Note:
If Image, Title, and Text are not present, it will get those in the Post/Page.

For 3 items:
1. If no item is set as a big card, the last item will automatically set as big.
2. In the case of multiple big cards, only the first card will be set as big.

sub_fields.label: Content type
sub_fields.name: content_type
sub_fields.instructions:
Content for this section will come from the Sitewide.

For Contact Info, see Sitewide > Contact
For Offices, see Sitewide > Offices

sub_fields.message: This section will show child pages of the "All departments" page set in the Sitewide > Departments.

sub_fields.label: Filter by category
sub_fields.name: filter_by_category
sub_fields.instructions: If no category selected, all FAQs will be displayed in the section.

sub_fields.label: No. of items to display
sub_fields.name: count
sub_fields.instructions: Limit the no. of FAQ items to display.

sub_fields.message: This section will show the Featured Jobs from Greenhouse.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions:
Recommended sizes:
1. Image / Video section - Outside grid: 1920px x 800px
2. Image / Video section - Inside grid: 1160px x 515px
3. 50 / 50 section: 560px x 400px

sub_fields.label: Preview Image
sub_fields.name: preview_image
sub_fields.instructions:
Recommended sizes:
1. Image / Video section - Outside grid: 1920px x 800px
2. Image / Video section - Inside grid: 1160px x 515px
3. 50 / 50 section: 560px x 400px

sub_fields.label: Show first on mobile
sub_fields.name: show_first_on_mobile
sub_fields.instructions: This will display the image/video after the section title on mobile.

sub_fields.message: Job search form will be displayed as the section's content.
This section will show all child pages of the "All Locations Page" page set in the Sitewide > Locations.

sub_fields.label: Items
sub_fields.name: items
sub_fields.instructions: If Image, Title, and Link are not present, it will get those in the Post/Page.

sub_fields.label: Slider on mobile?
sub_fields.name: slider_on_mobile
sub_fields.instructions: This will change the Item's display layout to a slider on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Items
sub_fields.name: items
sub_fields.instructions: If Image, Title, and Link are not present, it will get those in the Post/Page.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: For Location page, you can use [job-count] tag to display the no. of jobs available.

sub_fields.message: Related info will display related posts (same category).
Related positions will display related jobs (same category).

sub_fields.label: Use Image as the section's background
sub_fields.name: is_bg_image
